definition: person in a vegetative state/human vegetable
angiosperm (flowering plants with seed contained in a fruit)
gymnosperm (plants with seed contained in a cone)

sentences.english: Father Mabeuf was one of those persons for whom plants have souls.
sentences.chinese: 和某些人一樣，馬白夫公公也認爲植物是有靈魂的。

sentences.english: Suffice it to say that the following responses of some umbelliferous plants have been observed .
sentences.chinese: 下面僅就已觀察到的幾種傘形科植物的反應予以說明。

sentences.english: Other plants can't do without tanking up loads of sunlight.
sentences.chinese: 其它的植物就非得飽嘗充足的陽光。

sentences.english: The process of phytosterol extraction from soybean oil deodorizer distillate was studied.
sentences.chinese: 對脫臭餾出物中提取植物甾醇的工藝進行了研究。

sentences.english: The sources of Chinese medicine are mainly floras, also includes animals and mineral.
sentences.chinese: 中藥的來源主要是植物，也有一些動物和礦物。

sentences.english: Play checkers while the plants grow.
sentences.chinese: 當等待植物生長時，可以下下棋。

sentences.english: Any plant of the genus hoya having fleshy leaves and usually nectariferous flowers.
sentences.chinese: 球蘭屬的任一種植物，肉質葉，花朵通常分泌蜜汁。

sentences.english: Some evidence is available to aid our understanding of the biogenesis of membrane of microbodies in plants.
sentences.chinese: 有些證據有助於我們瞭解植物微體膜的生物發生。

sentences.english: And as it is in the floral tribe, so it is in God's kingdom.
sentences.chinese: 在植物界如此，在天國也是如此。

sentences.english: Fruit-of Wudang Mountain in prestigious Ming Dynasty Wudang Mountain is the rare plant.
sentences.chinese: 武當山榔梅果在明代享有盛譽，是武當山的稀有植物。

sentences.english: South African plant widely cultivated for its showy pure white spathe and yellow spadix.
sentences.chinese: 長有耀眼的純白色苞和黃色纖維的一種南非種植植物。

sentences.english: The buttercup is a wild plant with bright yellow cup - shaped flowers.
sentences.chinese: 毛茛是一種野生植物，開杯形黃色花。

sentences.english: There exists a close relationship between plants and chiral compounds.
sentences.chinese: 植物與手性化合物存在着非常密切的聯繫。

sentences.english: These plants must be sheltered from direct sunlight.
sentences.chinese: 這種植物必須遮起來，免受陽光直射。

sentences.english: This paper deals with the floristic statistics, analysis of the 418 species on wild ligneous plants.
sentences.chinese: 本文對418種野生木本植物進行了區系統計和分析。

sentences.english: Silvereyes are omnivorous but have a particular fondness for fruit.
sentences.chinese: 灰胸繡眼鳥是雜食性的但是尤其喜愛食用植物的果實。
